name: 3D shape
description: A simple 3D shape such as a cube, with custom images for each face.

conditions.name: Compare shape
conditions.description: Test which shape is currently set.

params.name: Shape
params.description: The shape to check.

conditions.name: Compare Z height
conditions.description: Compare the current Z height of the shape.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current Z height.

params.name: Z height
params.description: The Z height to compare to.

conditions.name: Is face visible
conditions.description: Test whether one of the six shape faces is currently visible.

params.name: Face
params.description: The face to check.

actions.name: Set shape
actions.description: Change to a different 3D shape type.

params.name: Shape
params.description: The shape to set.

actions.name: Set Z height
actions.description: Set the current Z height of the shape.

params.name: Z height
params.description: The Z height of the shape to set. The view looks down from a height of 100.

actions.name: Set face visible
actions.description: Set whether one of the six shape faces is visible.

params.name: Face
params.description: The face to check.

params.name: Visible
params.description: Whether to show or hide this face of the shape.

actions.name: Set face image
actions.description: Set a face of the shape to use the image of another face.
actions.display_text: Set [i]{0}[/i] face to use image of [i]{1}[/i] face

params.name: Face
params.description: The face to change the image for.

params.name: Image
params.description: The image to use for the chosen face.

actions.name: Set Z tiling factor
actions.description: Set the scale factor to apply for image repetition on the Z axis.

params.name: Z tiling factor
params.description: The Z tiling factor to set.

actions.name: Set face object
actions.description: Set a face of the shape to use the image of another object. An instance of the object must be in the same layout.
actions.display_text: Set [i]{0}[/i] face to use image of {1}

params.name: Face
params.description: The face to change the image for.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to use for the face image.

actions.name: Set back face culling
actions.description: Set whether to automatically hide faces that are pointing away from the camera.

params.name: Back face culling
params.description: Whether to enable back face culling.

expressions.name: ZHeight
expressions.description: The current Z height of the shape.

expressions.name: ZTilingFactor
expressions.description: The current Z tiling factor for image repetition on the Z axis.

expressions.name: FaceImagePointX
expressions.description: The X position of an image point on one of the shape's faces.

params.name: Face
params.description: Number of face (0-5).

params.name: ImagePoint
params.description: Name or number of image point to get.

expressions.name: FaceImagePointY
expressions.description: The Y position of an image point on one of the shape's faces.

params.name: Face
params.description: Number of face (0-5).

params.name: ImagePoint
params.description: Name or number of image point to get.

expressions.name: FaceImagePointZ
expressions.description: The Z position of an image point on one of the shape's faces.

params.name: Face
params.description: Number of face (0-5).

params.name: ImagePoint
params.description: Name or number of image point to get.

expressions.name: FaceImagePointCount
expressions.description: The number of image points on one of the shape's faces.

params.name: Face
params.description: Number of face (0-5).
